meanings.definition: Young people, especially children or teenagers.
meanings.sent1: The playground was filled with joyful youngsters playing tag.
meanings.sent2: The school organized a field trip for the youngsters to the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The youngsters giggled as they tried to fit too many people on the swing set.
meanings.sent4: The youngsters were like a flock of energetic birds, chirping and fluttering around.
meanings.sent5: The image of the youngsters running through the sprinklers will always bring a smile to my face.

meanings.sent1: The youngsters gathered at the park for a picnic under the shade.
meanings.sent2: The band was made up of talented youngsters who played music with passion.
meanings.sent3: The youngsters formed a line to take turns riding the carousel at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The team of youngsters worked together like a well-oiled machine to complete the project.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the youngsters huddled around a campfire, sharing stories, was heartwarming.
